佷字的基本解释

佷
hěn
古同“很”。违背，不顺从。

佷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hěn］
［《玉篇》户懇切］
凶狠。
[②]［héng］
［《集韻》胡登切，平登，匣。］
地名用字。汉代有佷山县，属武陵郡，在今湖北长阳县。参见《汉书·地理志上》。

佷字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　佷； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页100第24
【集韻】胡登切，音恆。【後漢·蔡邕傳】董卓自佷用。　又佷山，縣名。屬湖廣武陵郡，出藥草。

佷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
佷字的起名意思

暂无。

Tong
Basic explanation of words
Tong
hěn
Gu Tong is "very". Disobey, disobey.
Tong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [hěn]
["Jade Pian" sincerely sincerely]
fierce.
[②]［héng］
["Ji Yun" Hu Dengqie, Ping Deng, Xia. ]
Place names in words. In the Han Dynasty, there was Sheshan County, which belonged to Wuling County, in today's Changyang County, Hubei. See "Book of Han Geography".
Tong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [The Department of Human Characters] 　佷; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 100 24
[Ji Yun] Hu Dengqie, the sound is constant. [Later Han·Cai Yong Biography] Dong Zhuo used it by himself.　Yeshan, the name of the county. It belongs to Wuling County of Huguang County and produces medicinal herbs.
